text: @NYGovCuomo @ChrisCuomo That's a false choice. Cuz if anyone thinks letting a pandemic run rampant will miraculously not affect the economy in a myriad of bad ways, they have a lot to learn. The choice is between controlling it & taking a temporary hit, or not controlling it resulting in total disaster.
